metadata.title: CVE-2022-35649 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The vulnerability was found in Moodle, occurs due to improper inputvalidation when parsing PostScript code. An omitted execution parameterresults in a remote code execution risk for sites running GhostScriptversions older than 9.50. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability mayresult in complete compromise of vulnerable system.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
